    public class SpanAdapter
extends Object

    A class that is used to create Brat Span to CAS and vice-versa
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

    • Method Detail

      • setSingleTokenBehavior

        public void setSingleTokenBehavior(boolean aSingleTokenBehavior)
        Span can only be made on a single token (not multiple tokens), e.g. for POS or Lemma annotations. If this is set and a span is made across multiple tokens, then one annotation of the specified type will be created for each token. If this is not set, a single annotation covering all tokens is created.

      • isSingleTokenBehavior

      • addToCas

        public void addToCas(String aLabelValue,
            BratAnnotatorUIData aUIData)
        Update the CAS with new/modification of span annotations from brat
        Parameters:
        aLabelValue - the value of the annotation for the span
        aUIData - Other information obtained from brat such as the start and end offsets

      • getPosAdapter

        public static final SpanAdapter getPosAdapter()
        Convenience method to get an adapter for part-of-speech. NOTE: This is not meant to stay. It's just a convenience during refactoring!
